sys_script_include.name: LoadData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f0275652dbd30010281270e2399619b9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_331786_proj_tt.LoadData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>LoadData</name><script><![CDATA[function LoadData() {
    var s = current.subject1;
    var app = '';
    var sec;
    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_courses');
    gr.addQuery('course_name', s);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        sec = gr.sys_id;
    }
    var grn = new GlideRecord('x_331786_proj_tt_faculty');
    grn.addQuery('sub_opt', sec);
    grn.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        app = gr.sys_id.toString();
    }
    return 'sys_idIN' + app;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-04 11:10:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>f0275652dbd30010281270e2399619b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LoadData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project-Time Table Management System" source="x_331786_proj_tt">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Project-Time Table Management System">1616c3eddb530010281270e2399619b4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f0275652dbd30010281270e2399619b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-04 11:14:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
